fields.name: Don't have an Arduino? Would like to test your code on a computer or just play around?
fields.value: Perhaps you have an arduino, and would simple like a browser-based simulator? Whatever the reason. Give Wokwi a try!

components.label: Try WokWi today! (opens in new tab) https://wokwi.com

embeds.title: WokWi - A browser-based Arduino Simulator
embeds.description: Test all your Arduino code on a browser. No need to install Arduino or any other software. Just navigate to WokWi and start coding!
